Package adrenaline.model.deck

Enum WeaponType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<WeaponType>
      • adrenaline.model.deck.WeaponType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WeaponType>
    public enum WeaponType
extends java.lang.Enum<WeaponType>
    WeaponType is the enumeration class which lists all the weapon types in the game. Used by Weapon class.

      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Getter to obtain the description of a weapon.
      java.util.List<Ammo> getGrabbingCost()
      Getter to obtain the cost in ammo to grab a weapon from the game board, which is the reload cost except the "top" ammo represented on the weapon's card, that is the first ammo memorized in the reloadingAmmo attribute.

      • getGrabbingCost

        public java.util.List<Ammo> getGrabbingCost()
        Getter to obtain the cost in ammo to grab a weapon from the game board, which is the reload cost except the "top" ammo represented on the weapon's card, that is the first ammo memorized in the reloadingAmmo attribute.
        Returns:
        the cost to grab a weapon from the game board, that is the reloadingAmmo attribute except its first element.
